Text:
To retrieve the most up-to-date DiDays ICE mod, just check http://didays.derkb.de/downloads/Beta/Semper%20Fi/?C=M;O=D
It's his foldered homepage where he always uploads his latest releases.

Thought it noteworthy, considering DiDay is the biggest historical expansion mod to HoI3.

I'm sure, "all user mods".

The August Storm mod alone is ten times bigger than this upload.
